p: For the analysis of caspase-3 activity, INS-1E cells were incubated for two days as described for cellular ATP levels assay. After treatment with cytokines and bergenin for 48 hr, 50 Î¼L of Caspase-Glo 3/7 reagent was added to each well. After 2 hr incubation at room temperature, luminescence was measured using SpectraMax 5M e microplate reader (Molecular Devices, USA).
